task.summary: Default task
Implementing product wise and total purchase cost,revenue and profit in the incremental manner.. in progress.. to be updated in businessAccount
establish communication between Product and BusinessAccount domain..in progress
User story to add excess profit to nodal account from product to business account ... in progress
updated revenue and profit coming form product to business account... the update is yet to be done on read side of business account.. in progress
Completing communication of BusinessAccount domain with other domain.. in progress.
Documentation in progress.
Fixed issue in CalculatorChain
Fixed issue in
Defect fixes.. added missing attribute setting and annotation
Default constructor needed for deserializer
Fixes to offer price creation and calculation
Fixed issue in receiving PriceBucket default end date in PriceBucketChangedEventListener
Fixed issue in price calculation at read side
Fixes in subscriber domain so as to create a aggregate event for all deliveries of a subscription for it to be fed to payment domain. Some defect fixes in product domain.
Rewriting payments -- in progress
Created structure for defining a payment scheme and passing it to subscriber domain so that subscriber will choose desired payment scheme at the time of subscription creation.
Fixed issue related to updaton of Pricebucket accoring to product pricing category. Also payment scheme implementation .. in progress.
Fixed issue related to updation of Pricebucket according to product pricing category.

1. Payment domain implementation .. in progress 2. Fixed logic for calculating break even price and associated it with fixed price and variable price update event. 3. Other defect fixes related to price calculation.
Fixed issue in

Fix to the logic which retrieves actual demand data for the duration of 'demand curve period'. Earlier the query was "end date between". But for None committed product end date is always '31-12-9999'. So it was breaking. So instead of that the modified query considers "from Date Between".

Fix to the logic which retrieves actual demand data for the duration of 'demand curve period'. Earlier the query was "end date between". But for None committed product end date was '31-12-9999'. So it was breaking. Actual View should alway represent single day. So changed the logic of listeners to set start date and end date as the SAME day.
Converted EnumSet to List due to deserialization challenges. Fixed an issue in Forecast builder
Fixed issue in updatePseudoActualsFromActuals to ensure that subscriptions are present before continuing the method
Implementation of the user story for receiving a payment and distributing it among deliveries in the order of their delivery dates.

Refactoring of PriceBucketCreation at price calculation so as to ensure that the created price bucket will carry correct price bucket Id based on the Product pricing category it belongs to.. Creation of DeliveryDetails structure inside payment domain as the same will be needed by DuePaymentCalculationEngine

Modified ProductRegisteredEvent in all applicable domains to incorporate taggedPriceVersionId and Date. Added two events from Product to Payments domain so as to register changes in offer price and tagged price. Moved few classes from Product domain to commons as the same have to be used for Payments domain.

Processed incoming events from Product to Payments domain. 1. ProductRegisteredEvent 2. OfferPriceChangedEvent 3. ProductStatusUpdatedEvent Created two servies for offer pricing and tagged pricing to be used inside due calculation engine.
Fixed issue in logic to take either offer price or percent discount depending on pricing cateogry of product registered in subscription.
First hand implementation of DueCorrectionEngine and required accesseries code.. in progress
Defect fixes related to new subscription additions in actuals views. Some structure set up for Payment.. in progress.
Implementation of DuePaymentCorrectionEngine.. in progress
Fixed issue in DemandForecasterChain.. Some code of PaymentAccount.. in progress.
PaymentDueCorrectionEngine implementation.. completed under review.. needs test case
Integration of DuePaymentCorrectionEngine with PaymentAccount.
Correction to the event which causes due amount correction
Removed JsonSerialize/Deserialize from all enums. two new user stories .. add Delivery/ remove delivery to payments
Document update .. for Subscriber domain.
Updated lifecycles for Payment, Subscriber and now working on Benefits
Completed documentation for Benefits domain

MESSAGE.value: Fix to the logic which retrieves actual demand data for the duration of 'demand curve period'. Earlier the query was "end date between". But for None committed product end date was '31-12-9999'. So it was breaking. Actual View should alway represent single day. So changed the logic of listeners to set start date and end date as the SAME day.
